result.name: continuing-survey-of-road-goods-transport-ni
result.notes: Domestic data for Northern Ireland registered Heavy Goods Vehicles (HGVs), input data includes names and addresses of individuals and companies together with Vehicle Registration Mark. (10,000 vehicle records and approximately 80,000 trips)

organization.name: department-for-transport
organization.title: Department for Transport
organization.description:
We work with our agencies and partners to support the transport network that helps the UK’s businesses and gets people and goods travelling around the country. We plan and invest in transport infrastructure to keep the UK on the move.

DFT is a ministerial department, supported by 22 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-transport

result.title: Continuing Survey of Road Goods Transport NI

extras.value: Aggregated data (but not personal information) at: http://www.dft.gov.uk/pgr/statistics/datatablespublications/freight/goodsbyroad/roadfreightstatistics2009
